mapper.select: /*[TbbsCmtInf.xml][selectTbbsCmtInfList][댓글 목록 조회][TANINE]*/ SELECT TTT1.* FROM ( SELECT CEIL(TT1.ROW_NUM / #{rows, JDBCTYPE=NUMERIC}) AS PAGE , CEIL(@ROW_NUMBER / #{rows, JDBCTYPE=NUMERIC}) AS TOTAL_PAGE , @ROW_NUMBER AS TOTAL_COUNT , TT1.* FROM ( SELECT (@ROW_NUMBER := @ROW_NUMBER + 1) AS ROW_NUM , T1.* FROM ( SELECT A.CMT_SEQ AS CMT_SEQ /* 댓글번호 */ , IFNULL(A.PRNT_SEQ, 'PR') AS PRNT_SEQ /* 상위문서번호 */ , A.CRTR_ID AS CRTR_ID /* 생성자ID */ , A.TGT_USR_ID AS TGT_USR_ID /* 타겟 사용자ID */ , IFNULL( (SELECT S1.LOGIN_ID FROM TMBR_USR_INF S1 WHERE S1.USR_ID = A.TGT_USR_ID ), (SELECT S1.LOGIN_ID FROM TMBR_ADM_LGN_INF S1 WHERE S1.USR_ID = A.TGT_USR_ID )) AS TGT_ID /* 타겟ID */ , IFNULL( (SELECT S1.LOGIN_ID FROM TMBR_USR_INF S1 WHERE S1.USR_ID = A.CRTR_ID ), (SELECT S1.LOGIN_ID FROM TMBR_ADM_LGN_INF S1 WHERE S1.USR_ID = A.CRTR_ID )) AS LGN_ID /* 로그인ID */ , DATE_FORMAT(A.CRT_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS F_CRT_DTTM , A.CTS AS CTS /* 내용 */ , CASE WHEN #{user_auth_type, JDBCTYPE=VARCHAR} = '10' THEN 'Y' ELSE (CASE WHEN A.CRTR_ID = #{crtr_id, JDBCTYPE=VARCHAR} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) END AS MOD_ABLE_YN FROM TBBS_CMT_INF A WHERE A.MODL_SEQ = #{modl_seq, JDBCTYPE=NUMERIC} AND A.DOC_SEQ = #{doc_seq, JDBCTYPE=NUMERIC} ORDER BY IF(ISNULL(A.PRNT_SEQ), A.CMT_SEQ, A.PRNT_SEQ), A.CRT_DTTM ) T1 , (SELECT @ROW_NUMBER := 0) T2 ) TT1 ) TTT1 WHERE TTT1.PAGE = #{page, JDBCTYPE=NUMERIC}
